SamPy.bolshoi.findRedshiftsBolshoiTrees.FindRedshiftInfo¶

SamPy.bolshoi.findRedshiftsBolshoiTrees.FindRedshiftInfo(files, columns)¶

Finds redshift information from files when the column information has been specified.

Param :columns
